name: AVAssetWriterInputPixelBufferAdaptor
desc: An object that appends video samples to an asset writer input.

items.name: init(assetWriterInput: AVAssetWriterInput, sourcePixelBufferAttributes: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Creates a new pixel buffer adaptor to receive pixel buffers for writing to the output file.

items.name: func append(CVPixelBuffer, withPresentationTime: CMTime) -> Bool
items.desc: Appends a pixel buffer to the adaptor.

items.name: var pixelBufferPool: CVPixelBufferPool?
items.desc: A pool of pixel buffers to append to the adaptorâ€™s input.

items.name: var sourcePixelBufferAttributes: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The attributes of the pixel buffers that the pool contains.

items.name: var assetWriterInput: AVAssetWriterInput
items.desc: The asset writer input to which the adaptor appends pixel buffers.
